description.text: An application for creating itineraries and adjusting them to on the go
Product Strategist, Qualitative Researcher, UI Designer
Interviews, User Testing, Rapid Prototyping, Adobe XD
A B2B2C financial technology startup focused on creating a digital advice platform for retirement planning
Requirements Gathering, Product Design, Technical Software Design, UX Research, Agile Management

about.summary: Currently working as a product designer at NextCapital, I spend my days right in the intersection between design, research and development! Outside of work, I have been taking advantage of the nice weather and exploring the city of Chicago while trying out all new foods this city has to offer.
